name: Fleet Feet
overview: Beyond the stars, in a galaxy much like our own, the Spirits of Sportsdom decreed a need for an intergalactic marathon. They named it Fleet Feet, for it was to be a race of swift thinking and fancy footwork. For eons, the best and brightest from every galaxy have met its unique challenge. Now it is your turn. Put your best feet forward and speed them through this space race. Success depends not only on the speed of your feet but on how quickly you think while the game is afoot!
